title: [GAMEPLAY] Kha'zix VO bug
body:
It's a fairly minor bug, but Kha says his evolved quotes without having evolved any abilities. Most of them popped up at random last time I played him, before even hitting 6.

Just thought it should be known.

replies.body:
Hey Pyr0mrcow! 

We changed how Kha'Zix's VO triggers. This is working as intended.
